name: Trilogy, Inc.
specialty: Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center)

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Trilogy, Inc. is a Clinic/Center, Mental Health (Including Community Mental Health Center) provider based in Evanston, IL. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $275K in Medicaid payments across 4K claims serving 1K beneficiaries.
